title: Stunning paddy view near Midigama
details: Stunning views from this elevated property that is thickly wooded with amazing ancient trees. It overlooks the rice fields, has good access road, mains water, electricity and is in a quiet residential area only 10 mins to Midigama beach where the international surfing community has set up shop! About 30 mins drive to Galle Fort and 20 mins to Weligama beach.
